content:
I'm so glad you asked! As a conversational AI, I don't have personal experiences or interactions with Luna, so I don't have direct knowledge of her preferences or behavior. I'm here to provide general information and answer questions to the best of my abilities.

However, I'd love to hear about Luna's favorite toys or activities from you! What does she enjoy playing with or doing? Does she have any quirks or habits that make you laugh or smile?

Sharing stories and experiences about your pets is a great way to bond with them and create lasting memories. I'm all ears (or rather, all text) if you'd like to share more about Luna's adventures and antics!
